summary: Email correspondence from November 2019 regarding research supporting the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation. The researcher confirms findings on two legal issues and attaches a document with statutes and explanations.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses research being conducted to support the investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Research submission on Maxwell investigation
events.description: A researcher submits findings on two legal issues related to the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation, confirming the prosecutor's points and attaching a detailed document.

keyFacts: Research was being conducted in November 2019 to support the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation.
The researcher confirmed the prosecutor was correct on two specific legal issues.
A detailed document with statutes and explanations was attached to the email.
